text: Charles Gyude Bryant (17 January 1949 â€“ 16 April 2014) was a Liberian politician and businessman. He was the Chairman of the Transitional Government of Liberia. He served as chairman from 2003 to 2006. He was a member of the Liberian Action Party. Bryant died at the John F. Kennedy Medical Center in Monrovia, aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Presidents of Liberia
title: Gyude Bryant
